name: My Fashion Studio
overview: Open your own fashion studio and become a famous trendsetter You take on the role of a young woman who wants to conquer the world of fashion, starting as an intern and ultimately opening your own fashion studio Customize your designs with stylish fabrics and cuts Choose from a large selection of fabrics, patterns and cuts to create a look that is completely your own Tailor your clothes with the stylus, including cutting out and sewing to create stunning outfits for magazines, movie posters, stars, and VIPs Choose your models Complete their looks with trendy accessories, hairstyles, and shoes See your designs in the coolest magazines As you get more famous, your creations are highlighted in magazines, movie posters, catwalks, and catalogues Fight General Gothmoth, the leader of a gang of moths that try to sabotage your creations Play fun games to keep the moths away from your creations Create your trends at any time Play in free mode to create clothes at any moment Unlock new missions in career mode
